alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:56PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...An area of showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Eagle, Pitkin and southeastern Garfield Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 755 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an areas of showers and thunderstorms over Carbondale, or 14 miles southeast of Glenwood Springs, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Basalt around 800 PM MDT. Snowmass around 810 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Aspen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 114 and 119. Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 50. Colorado 133 between mile markers 51 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
